Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 48th overall pick, by Boston (FBA) in 1975...
Injured on 6/1/1975 with a Bruised Hand, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/1982, off James Willman (TOL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/16/1982, off Eric Owings (MAN)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at First Base in 1982...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1983, hitting .389 with 3 HR, 4 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Columbus on 6/5/1985...
Won World Championship with Boston (FBA) in 1985...
Traded from Boston (FBA) to Ashburn on 4/18/1987 (Going to Ash: 1B J. Tamplin. Going to SHP: P F. Mosqueda, P V. Fermoso)...
Won World Championship with Ashburn in 1987...
Released by Ashburn on 5/19/1988...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (FBA) on 5/19/1988 to a 1-year deal worth $724,000 per year...
Traded from Boston (FBA) to Plum Grove on 6/26/1989 (Going to PG: 1B J. Tamplin. Going to SHP: 2B E. Arredondo, P S. Hidalgo, P C. Fuentez)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1989, hitting .545 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Released by Plum Grove on 4/7/1991...
Signed as a free agent by Troy on 5/12/1991 to a minor league contract...
